name: backbone-functional
description: Use Backbone models and collections without mutations: a smooth transition transition to immutability.

scripts.build: ./node_modules/.bin/babel src/backbone-functional.js --out-file dist/backbone-functional.js --source-maps && ./node_modules/.bin/uglifyjs dist/backbone-functional.js --screw-ie8 -o dist/backbone-functional.min.js --in-source-map dist/backbone-functional.js.map --source-map dist/backbone-functional.min.js.map && cp src/backbone-functional.js dist && cp package.json dist

author: Nicolas Gasull
